dialogues.speaker: Captain Lewis
dialogues.text: Alright, crew. We're approaching the abandoned space station. Stay sharp.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Tom Bradley
dialogues.text: Aye, captain. I'm reading some strange energy signatures coming from inside.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Lewis
dialogues.text: Take us in for a closer look. Let's see what we're up against.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Maya Singh
dialogues.text: Captain, I'm detecting some kind of alien technology on board. It's unlike anything I've seen before.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Lewis
dialogues.text: Alright, let's gear up and get ready to explore. We don't know what we'll find in there.
